long_description: At first glance, the women's Smith Spree Polarized Sunglasses are timeless, almost retro. Take a closer look and appreciate the modern blending of classic lines and cutting-edge technology. Lenses vary by frame color, but both offer 100% UV ray protection and are highly impact resistant. Root Beer Fade frames have polarized brown lenses; Zebra Split frames have polarized green gradient lenses; both block 85% of visible light. Polarization cuts glare from water, snow and asphalt and reduces eye fatigue. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Spree Polarized Sunglasses for women have a hydrophilic nosepiece and temple pads that become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: At first glance, the women's Smith Spree Polarized Sunglasses are timeless, almost retro. Take a closer look and appreciate the modern blending of classic lines and cutting-edge technology.
